 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקִי‎</span> **adjective** ==clean, free from, exempt==; — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Gen.24.41|Gen 24:41]] + 31 t.; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקִי‎</span> [[Ps.24.4|Ps 24:4]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקִיִּים‎</span> [[Jer.2.34|Jer 2:34]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקִיִּם‎</span> [[Gen.44.10|Gen 44:10]] + 6 t.; — 

**1.** ***free from guilt, clean, innocent***, \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקִי וְצַדִּיק ׃צַדִּיק‎</span> [[Exod.23.7|Exod 23:7]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקִי‎</span>: ***innocent person*** [[Job.4.7|Job 4:7]]; [[Job.17.8|Job 17:8]]; [[Job.22.19|Job 22:19]]; [[Job.22.30|Job 22:30]]; [[Job.27.17|Job 27:17]]; [[Ps.10.8|Ps 10:8]]; [[Ps.15.5|Ps 15:5]]; [[Prov.1.11|Prov 1:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נקיים‎</span> [[Job.9.23|Job 9:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דם נקי‎</span> ***innocent blood***, first used in [[BDB#D|D]], [[Deut.19.10|Deut 19:10]]; [[Deut.27.25|Deut 27:25]]; [[1Sam.19.5|1Sam 19:5]]; [[2Kgs.21.16|2Kgs 21:16]]; [[2Kgs.24.4|2Kgs 24:4]]; [[Ps.94.2|Ps 94:2]]; [[Ps.106.38|Ps 106:38]]; [[Prov.6.17|Prov 6:17]]; [[Isa.59.7|Isa 59:7]]; [[Jer.7.6|Jer 7:6]]; [[Jer.22.3|Jer 22:3]]; [[Jer.26.15|Jer 26:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דם חנקי‎</span> [[Deut.19.13|Deut 19:13]]; [[2Kgs.24.4|2Kgs 24:4]]; [[Jer.22.17|Jer 22:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הדם הנקי‎</span> [[Deut.21.9|Deut 21:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נקיים‎</span> [[Jer.19.4|Jer 19:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקִיִ מִדְּמֵי‎</span> [[2Sam.3.28|2Sam 3:28]] ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵעִם י‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַפַּיִם‎</span> [[Ps.24.4|Ps 24:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אביונים נקיים‎</span> [[Jer.2.34|Jer 2:34]]. 

**2.** ***free from punishment*** [[Exod.21.28|Exod 21:28]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[2Sam.14.9|2Sam 14:9]]. 

**3.** ***free, exempt from obligations*** [[Gen.44.10|Gen 44:10]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); from service in war [[Num.32.22|Num 32:22]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> person, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> **2 d**), [[Deut.24.5|Deut 24:5]]; [[1Kgs.15.22|1Kgs 15:22]] (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> and [[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]]<sup>ZMG xxii (1868), 129</sup>); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מן‎</span>, from oaths [[Gen.24.41|Gen 24:41]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Josh.2.17|Josh 2:17]]; [[Josh.2.19|Josh 2:19]]; [[Josh.2.20|Josh 2:20]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]). 



 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקִיא‎</span> **adjective** ==innocent==; — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּם נָקִיא‎</span> ***innocent blood*** [[Joel.4.19|Joel 4:19]]; [[Jonah.1.14|Jonah 1:14]] (both [[BDB#Kt|Kt]]; [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקִי‎</span>).
